entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Nipigon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:14 a.m. EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of freezing rain or ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to ice pellets this afternoon. Periods of rain near Lake Superior this morning and early this afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to snow at times heavy and local blowing snow this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
